para:
This is the format used by the software that comes with the
Transystem i-Blue757 Pro GPS . It is very similar to the iBlue747 format, apart from the date format being reversed.
The csv log file can be extracted from the GPS receiver using the BT747 software available from

section.title: INDEX
section.para: A sequential integer which corresponds for each logged point in the file.

section.title: DATE
section.para: Date that the point was recorded, in the format YYYY/MM/DD

section.title: TIME
section.para: Time that the point was recorded, 24-hr format H:MM:SS. Unsure how fractions of a second are handled.

section.title: LATITUDE
section.para: Degrees above the equator (use negative for south of the equator)

section.title: LONGITUDE
section.para: Degrees east of the Prime Meridian (use negative for east of the Prime Meridian/Greenwich)

section.title: HEIGHT
section.para: Height above sea level in meters

section.title: DISTANCE
section.para: Distance covered since last point in meters
